description: Promoting Sustainable Biomass Energy Production and Modern Bioenergy Technologies in Sri Lanka

subproject.description: The aim of the project is to develop a GEF Full-Sized Project (FSP) under the Climate Changte theme "to build capacity of Sri Lanka on the use of Biomass to generate energy."  The PPG will enable the project to collect background information on renewable energy options, conduct stakeholder interviews, develop technology options, and prepare management arrangements plus the initial set up for the FSP implementation.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Biomass Energy Production

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities

title: PIMS 4226 CC PPG: Sri Lanka Biomass
